114.content:
You sprint through the back alleys towards the spaceport. The government has issued a lockdown on this planet and you don't plan on sitting around until it all gets sorted out. You really wish the authorities hadn't grounded your ship after finding all that contraband hidden inside. The spaceport officials might not be willing to give a first-class ticket on the last shuttle out of here to a known smuggler, so the best plan would be to sneak aboard a bounty hunters ship. Registered bounty hunter's ships get the luxury of having scanning waived when entering and leaving a planet. You do have a few pieces of technology that can falsify scans, but seeings as your ship is being taken apart by offical investigators you don't plan on getting them back. It's time to do what you do best, evade the authorities.

This isn't your first time sneaking into the spaceport, you have set up meeting with contacts here dozens of times. You pass through a hole in the fence when the guards aren't looking and quickly make your way to a back entrance. First thing you have to do is disable the cameras in the hangar, no one can know you snuck aboard a ship. Checking to make sure the coast is clear you slip into the surveillance room. Putting your computer skills to good use you delete all video of you sneaking into the building just like you've done many times before, they should really upgrade their equipment. Then you disable all cameras from here to the hangar bay. Now if you can just avoid any patrolling guards you'll be home free.

Luckily for you all the guards have moved into the main area trying to keep an angry crowd under control. You slip into the hangar without incident and try to find the least suspicious ship of the lot. Deciding on a small orange ship you get underneath it and open an emergency hatch to the cargo hold, which is a plain grey metal room with a few crates that have been secured to the floor. This is a small ship with a cramped cargo hold, but it will have to make do, at least until you can get to another planet. You try to make yourself as comfortable as possible as you wait until the ships owner returns and departs.

You are jarred awake when the ship comes to life, the engines roar as you ascend through the atmosphere and soon enough you leave orbit heading somewhere that's hopefully better than here. You take a moment to check through your small pack, you have a few rations in case this ends up being a long trip, your credit chip, and of course your trusty sidearm. You carefully slip your weapon into place in the back of your belt, out of sight from any potential attackers. Hopefully this trip will go smoothly and you won't have to fight any grizzled bounty hunters.

The thought makes you laugh to yourself, but your laughter get interrupted by approaching footsteps...

As she continued to spread and curl them, clearly hoping to retain your attention, she was showing off the shade of rose pink her nails were painted in the process. Too enamored by their supple movements, you never even bothered to utter a word, only gingerly flicking your tongue towards her toes, your mind in a haze.

Wendy scowled at you, drawing her foot away, at much the same time Peach chirped in delight.

"Hmph, so be it," the only daughter of Bowser's children began to speak, disdain tinging her voice and bringing you back to reality. "I figured you would've wanted someone who made her own future, but it seems you're too interested in spoiled princesses to be of any use." She twirled her finger around and tapped the bars of the cage, your ring shimmering before bursting in a puff of bright mist. "Enjoy your company, whatever good she'd serve, anyway." With that, Wendy stormed off, slamming the door shut.

You weren't sure of what her next move would be, and quite frankly, the same could be said for yourself. Peach, however, tackled you, wrapping her arms around your midsection in an overwhelmingly fond embrace, lightly running her hands across your back. A chorus of "thank you"s echoed in the otherwise-drab room before the mushroom princess stared gratefully at you.

"You've done my kingdom a great service just now. Bowser and his forces won't stop, but you've given Mario some extra time to rescue us." Indeed, the droning of an airship faintly hummed through the stone walls; no doubt Wendy was fuming over her hold on you being weaker than she expected.

"After all you've done for me," you started to reply. "it'd be pretty selfish to throw all that away. And, to be honest..." You beckoned Peach to come a little closer towards you before continuing. The room was empty, true, but there could easily be Boos or Magikoopas hidden in the shadow beneath the cage; you preferred playing things safe. The princess craned forward, tilting an ear towards you. After a moment of looking around, you finished your sentence, whispering in her ear. "... her feet weren't really attractive at all." You were met with Peach's giggling, clasping a hand over her mouth while you simply enjoyed the moment, starting to relax knowing that, if only for the time being, you and Peach were safe from the Koopa king's machinations.

After a minute, the princess regained enough composure to resume. "So, then, it's true? About your liking feet, I mean." Peach saw the look of hesitance on your face and continued, a small grin upon her face. "I don't mind at all, really, given it might've just saved my subjects." Internally, you sighed in relief, nodding your head, and as if in response, Peach beamed even brighter, holding her legs up. "Well, we've got nothing else to do. They're all yours." You would've handled her feet, but you never had the chance; the moment she finished her sentence, Peach pressed her feet against your face, eliciting a brief, yet audible moan of both surprise and pleasure.

Being all you could see at the moment, you knew that you made the right choice in letting Peach's feet sway your decision. Her feet were actually quite large, a size 10 if you had to estimate. Her arches were high and well-defined, sloping up to her slender soles, which, you noticed, had a faint blush on them, tinging the skin pink. Peach started to rub her feet across your face, and you noticed that they had a bit of sweat on them; you didn't particularly mind, given it helped make it even easier for her to smother you with her soles that felt soft enough to be made of feathers, but more importantly, that same floral scent became more prominent. You had suspicions, but taking a few sniffs of her soles verified it; it was her feet that were the source. A few further inhalations put the aroma into detail, and luckily for Peach, her soles covering your face meant she couldn't see you playfully rolling your eyes; of course they'd smell like sweet, ripened peaches.

Peach could, however, hear you smelling her feet, much to her satisfaction. "See what you would've missed out on if you'd sided with her?" she said, in a tone more teasing than anything else she'd spoken yet. "Like I said..." she slid her feet downwards to cover your nose, letting you inhale their peachy fragrance as she tapped her toes on your face. "... they're all yours." You grabbed her feet by the ankles and, though it pained you, pulled them away from your face; it was only because, with them in your hands, you wanted...

Pauline (initially known as Lady in Japan) is Mario's beautiful first love interest that appeared in the original Donkey Kong. 12533221212.content:
(note: to keep track of the characters' dialogue, Robin's dialogue is presented in lavender, and Lucina's in navy.)

The silence in the tent mounted as Lucina kept the Falchion grasped firmly. She continued to glower, her deep blue eyes focused on you with such an intense glare until a chill ran through your spine. Slowly, she withdrew her sword, and as you felt the pressure in your throat lighten, you hoped your pleading got through to her. Those hopes, however, would soon be dashed, as her expression perked up slightly as she heard Robin's voice from outside; whatever she was discussing with Chrom seemed to have caught Lucina's attention quite easily. You could see her eyes darting towards the entrance of the tent for a few seconds before focusing back on you. You began to open your mouth, but never got the chance to speak.

"Wait right there," she ordered, pointing the tip of the sword towards the cot behind you, tapping it a few times for emphasis.

Lucina watched carefully as you took a seat on the edge of the bed, your hands having a firm grip on the cloth as you propped yourself down. A slight flush formed on your cheeks as you felt the dampness from her socks now pressed against your left hand, but luck seemed to be shifting more in your favor; Lucina hadn't noticed. You were sitting on the bed now, and that was good enough for her. Sheathing the Falchion, Lucina turned on one heel and exited the tent.

Already, your mind was racing. Was Lucina going to expose you to Robin? And if she was, what would they do with you? The idea of being thought of as an agent of the Grimleal and being "escorted" back to Plegia, or worse, killed where you were to make an example of you were too terrifying to fathom. You, a common thief just scraping out a living in Ylisse, whose life could very well end today, thanks to a simple misunderstanding.

Your frantic hyperventilating was cut short, taking deeper breaths to regain some composure. Your grip on Lucina's socks tightened as you steadily calmed down and tried listening to your surroundings. The slight chatter from outside the tent suggested Lucina was trying to pry Robin from Chrom's company, which would probably take a few minutes.

You had a little peace; why not make the most of it? You took Lucina's socks, and once again, you pressed them up against your nose. Now that you had the time to fully take in their scent, you were taken aback by how nice they really smelled; true, there was the scent of sweat imprinted on them, yet at the same time, there was an unmistakable floral aroma to it. Happily, you laid back on the bed, sniffing deeply to help ease your troubled mind. If nothing else, the chance to be in the presence of such an esteemed warrior as Lucina would make for a memorable experience, and to even indulge in what you hoped was the scent of her feet made it all the better... not quite the same as worshiping her feet, of course, but in the situation you found yourself in, you'd take whatever you can get.

Unfortunately, the moment wouldn't last much longer. "He couldn't have made it far if he tried," you could hear Lucina saying from outside the tent, cutting you short. You snapped back up and hastily tossed the socks to the edge of the bed. You nestled your hands in your lap and found a particularly uninteresting part of the floor to stare at right as the Shepherds' chief tactician and their newest member entered.

Robin tilted your head back up before you could react, taken aback by her delicate features. She held a quizzical expression on her face, her gray-gold eyes staring right at you. You flinched for a moment as she ran a finger across your cheek, feeling your rough skin. She eyed you for another second before turning away and addressing Lucina, still standing at the edge of the tent.

"Has he tried to weasel his way out of it? Any pleading or bribing?" "Well... he did, actually." Your blood ran cold at Lucina's comment. Your lust for a women's feet was your weakness, and it would serve as your downfall. "He tried to how flatter me with how attractive I was, and thought my feet would be as well." You could practically see Robin's eyes light up, her lips curved into a small yet none-too-innocent smile.

"And you also caught him smelling your socks? The same ones you had on during practice?" By the time Robin's sight traced a path to where you had hid Lucina's socks, you knew it was up, she had your number. "Well, I think I know just what to do with him." She got up off the bed and leaned in close to Lucina, whispering something inaudible to you.

It was telling that Lucina's only reaction at first was a few small nods of affirmation. However, it didn't take long for her eyes to shoot open, a firm blush coating her cheeks. "R-- Robin, are you sure about this!?," Lucina blurted out as her head snapping towards the tactician. "Think of what father would do if he found him! And you want him to--" Anything more Lucina had to say was cut short by Robin holding up a hand. "Technically, he'd be in our service. Think of it as working off his debt," Robin explained, her upraised hand gesturing to your abandoned sack on the tent floor, where a few small trinkets had spilled out.

Lucina drew a deep breath, a hand cupped to her mouth. "Well," Lucina began to say, "when you put it like that, he does need to repay us for invading our camp." Robin bobbed up and down on the balls of her feet, something you felt was completely intentional based on where you assumed this conversation was headed. "Perfect. So it's decided, then," Robin said, the pair conversing as if you weren't even in their presence. "We'll keep him here, and since he seems so enamored by your feet, you can have him worship them as much as you want... come to think of it, I might need him on what down time I get myself," Robin using that aside to conclude her statement. "Until he's made up for his thievery, we can just make him our little secret. Fair enough?"

(Spoiler alert for both Xenoblade Chronicles and Xenoblade Chronicles X, for those of you who haven't yet played/beaten either game.)

One of Nintendo's newer franchises, Xenoblade is a series of unrelated, grandiose RPGs, full of all manner of attractive women. There's the original Xenoblade Chronicles, set on the bodies of two titan-sized deities who fell each other in a battle eons ago, and the heroes and heroines that have thrived upon these titans. These brave souls, though first on a mission to protect their home of the Bionis from the invading Mechon, soon become embroiled in a mystery behind the very workings of their reality itself.

Primary female characters:
https://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/xen... (Fiora)
https://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/xen... (Melia)
https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/xen... (Sharla)

On the other hand, there's its successor, Xenoblade Chronicles X; in the year 2054, humanity escapes the demise of Earth to find a new home among the cosmos. The White Whale, one of the ships who escaped, settles on the planet Mira, and not only must its inhabitants use robotic doubles to gain a bearing on this foreign world, but they must also evade the watchful eye of the Ganglion responsible for their homeworld's destruction and find the lifehold core containing their flesh and blood forms.

1253322211.content:
(This chapter contains spoilers for Xenoblade Chronicles; in addition, it is set in a composite of the game's world both during and after the events of the story.)

A gentle breeze drifted through the air as you stood atop one of the countless arching stone cliffs that towered over the Gaur Plains. In the distance, the colossal entity once known to you as the Mechonis stood, its stance imposing and its six red eyes losing their glow in the morning sun, yet unmoving, as it had been since time immemorial. The Plains were your first stop upon exiting the mechanical titan; Miqol was kind enough to let you hitch a ride on the Junks ship to return to Bionis after your help in furthering relations between the Machina and Homs. You were grateful to him for his services, but more importantly, you were even more grateful that you could spend your day however you pleased.

Gently swaying back and forth, the grass around you rustled with your movements. You closed your eyes and took a deep breath, savoring the newfound tranquility in your surroundings. It was as if you could enjoy the scenery forever, but alas, that was out of the question; you had your own personal agenda and you would do everything in your power to fulfill it. From your vantage point, your eyes opened, viewing the only remaining Homs settlements on Bionis, Colonies 9 and 6. To you, however, they were better known as the homes to two of the world's saviors: Fiora, a former Homs-Machina cyborg and the vessel of Lady Meyneth, and Sharla, dedicated Colony Defense Force medic and one of the key benefactors to Colony 6's reconstruction. It would be a pleasure to see either of them, but your mind also gave you another option.

Indeed, there was another settlement that came to mind; at the top of the Bionis' head, above the Eryth Sea, lay Alcamoth, home of the proud High Entia, and with it, their new empress, Melia Antiqua. The thought of indulging your desires with nobility, and not just any nobility, but of the sorceress who helped save her world from itself proved to be another prospect you could undertake, and oh what an enticing prospect that would be indeed. You were torn between the two options, to head downwards to where the Homs reside, or trek skyward and hope the High Entia are more welcoming to you than with most other outsiders. Given the Machina were, as their species' name indicated, sapient life, they were nonetheless mechanical; you had no qualms in that regard, and you certainly wouldn't be opposed to spending time with Linada or Vanea if circumstances forced you to, but for now, you had a pair of full Homs and a mixed-blood High Entia beckoning for your presence.

125332222211.content:
(By the way, I'm going to call "Dromarch" with his original name Byakko, because I find his changed name in the localization retarded. Dromarch is a mythological welsh hound with multiple heads... rather than a giant white tiger, which the mythological Byakko is. I get a feeling it was changed just because they have given Nia's role to welsh woman and it would be "funny" if her blade had Wales-related name... which is just dumb.)

You did it! After months of wandering from titan to titan in the cloud sea, you finally found a job as a mercenary in Garfont village on Uraya! You parents back on Mor Ardain probably wouldn't approve of your choice, as they would almost surely rather see you in esteemed Ardainian military. Soldier's life however sounded extremely boring, forgettable, and limited, having to adhere to all those rules and discipline of the army, while you always preferred something that would give you some more freedom. You still lack a blade of your own, but thanks to your interest in combat since childhood, you have some skill with weapons.

Once you were done with the paperwork and a little combat trial to make sure if you had skills for the job, you decided to go grab something to eat and drink in the bar located in middle of the village. It is the dinner time however, and you quickly realize there are no free tables there... in fact there's just one chair left, at a table with seemingly gormotti girl, and a giant white tiger that seemed to be her blade. Without much choice in the matter you decided to have a seat opposite of her. She seemed bored before, but as you sat down she seemed to have started getting a closer look at you, probably not having seen you before in the camp, after all you just joined.

"Hi, I'm new here, it's not a problem if I sit here, right? I mean all other spots are taken." You say, not wanting the gormotti girl to think you sat with her for some kind of sinister motive

"So you are a newbie? That explains why I didn't see you before. Sure, whatever, you can sit here." Said the beige haired gormotti as she returned to eating her food, which appeared to be a Cream Orange Paratha.

"Are you a mercenary too?" You decided to ask, trying to strike up a conversation

"Huh? Not really, you can say I'm a friend of their dumb-ass leader though. Name's Nia by the way." The gormotti girl commented, before taking another piece of her paratha

"Ojousama, you shouldn't speak that way of Rex in front of others." The big tiger blade interrupted for a moment in a tone that reminded you a lot of a butler of some kind.

"Well how else do you call a guy who goes into the field without a skilled healer, Byakko? Maybe he will get Shellhead to do the healing for him now? That's one way to get everyone killed I suppose, he would be too busy posing and yelling about his eye of shiny justice or whatever." The gormotti girl replied to her blade, leaving you a bit confused who were they talking about

"Though I guess it has some pluses, at least I can rest for a bit today. Running around those hot wastelands in Mor Ardain like yesterday always makes me get all sweaty and tired. And unlike with cold climates like in Tantal, Pyra can't really help me out with that." Nia continued talking seemingly ignoring you being there for a moment, but then she suddenly seemed to get some kind of idea as a smirk appeared on her face

"Hey, Newbie! Since you are new here, there is some kinda hazing or initiation you have to go through, right?" The catgirl suddenly looked towards you again

"They didn't tell me anything about that... just a little combat trial to see if I am fit enough, and having to sign my name on some papers." You said, a bit confused why would she ask that, and how she seemed to suddenly give you a nickname already despite not even asking your name

"Actually... in Vandham's days, the newbies usually had to do bunch of tasks assigned to them by the leader on their first day. It was a good sort of preparation before the real mercenary work. Of course our current leader isn't here now, and Yew and Zuo don't seem too interested in carrying on that tradition." A burly Urayan male suddenly spoke from a neighboring table before turning back to his food

"Hmmm... I have an idea then." Nia said, finishing her cream orange paratha and looking towards you again while searching for something in her pouch

"I might not be the leader here, but why won't I give you your initiation tasks, Newbie? I will even give you this blade core for a job well done." Nia said and pulled out a genuine blade core from her pouch
"Most of the mercenaries here are drivers after all, so you definitely could use a blade of your own." The catgirl added after a moment, putting the core back to her pouch for now

She definitely had a point, but her offer seemed fishy at best. You barely met her, why would she want you to do any tasks for her? Byakko seemed just as confused, but didn't interrupt his driver there.

"What tasks did you have in mind?" You decided to ask before making any kind of commitment

"A foot rub for starters, my feet are sore after all the traveling around with Rex. I can't even ride on Byakko most of the time with him because then rest of our group can't keep up." Nia explained, still smirking a bit, clearly satisfied with her own idea to have you help her relax

"Ojousama I don't think it's very ladylike to just ask..." Byakko tried to say but was interrupted by his driver

"It's not like I'm forcing him, and it's just my feet. I always wanted to get a foot rub after a whole tiring day but never had anyone to ask for it." Nia said in middle of the white tiger's sentence

What will you do though?

We find our beloved Princess Peach captured once again. Hidden away in an dimly lit, underground chamber, deep under the koopa king's castle. Peach's arms was kneeling on the cold, dusty floor and her arms were bound by a heavy metal chain attached to the ground. She struggled to free herself but to no avail, she then noticed a large, horned figure approaching her.

"Bowser! When Mario comes he'll free me and kick you butt!" Peach threatened.

"Oh princess, i'm no longer Bowser... i go by Boswette now." The figure said as she stepped forward revealing herself.

Peach was shocked, It was almost as if she was staring into a mirror. Boswer now looked just like her, albeit larger, with flowing red hair and a pair of horns.

"H-how? Why?" Peach asked.

" I spend years chasing after you, trying to gain your affection. But you always rejected me, no matter how hard i tried. That was until i found this crown." Bowsette says as she points towards a pink crown nestled in her flowing red hear, between her horns.

"Thanks to this crown i realized that you don't deserve me! I'm a much better princess than you'll ever be! And Mario seems to agree. We've been meeting behind your back for quite a while now, and i convinced him to not save you this time." Bowsette explains.

"No, you're lying!" Peach cried out.

"Silence! You are mine now! And i shall do whatever i please with you. Now that you're all nice and chained up, it would be a good idea to get you accustomed to your new role..." Bowsette said as a malicious grin formed on her face.

Some time ago, Bowser had discovered a way to permanently infuse himself with a power-up.

Peach had discovered the plot, so she intercepted Bowser right before the Koopa King could give himself permanent Invincible Star power and threw a mini-mushroom...

Or what she thought was a Mini-Mushroom. To Peach's horror, it was the Super Crown Mushroom.

Bowser was furious when they discovered they were now and forever Princess Bowsette. Bowsette still had horns on her head, a tail, and fang teeth. She also had black claws on her fingers.

Peach began to calm down, thinking Bowsette no longer had the power of the Koopa King and could not use Peach's own magic power, believing they canceled each other out.

Then a furious Bowsette began to throw large rocks, big enough to reveal she still had her amazing strength.

Then Bowsette began to use mushroom-powered telekinesis, showing she had Peach's own magic, although as a novice, at least for the moment. Bowser was one to practice and train if he felt it was important.

After Bowsette ran off, Bowsette began to use her Peach appearance to steal stuff from the mushroom kingdom. Mario and Luigi weren't fooled, so Bowsette began to have her troops to attack other areas, so she could steal without interruption.

All to ruin Peach's reputation among the Mushroom Kingdom and the surrounding Kingdoms.

Peach didn't want to think about the other Peach impostors that were rumored to exist. Princess Booette, Princess Chompette, Princess Shyette, and so on.

At first, Peach thought it was a weird revenge the Princess Bowsette had in mind. After some thought, Peach realized Bowsette was planning something nasty, if it meant creating more versions of Princess Peach from Bowsette's minions.

Minions with the power of Princess Peach at their fingertips.

It was enough that Peach felt that Video Game Land needed another Hero.

===
Like how the Captain N show started, you were playing a Nintendo game when the screen changed to a green swirling portal. You heard a pleasant voice ask. 'Will you become my knight and save the Video game Land?"

You recognized the voice as Peach's and also remembered that no matter how long you spent in Video Game Land, you'd return the same moment you left.

So you cheerfully said yes and jumped into the TV.

As you traveled through the green vortex, you noticed a pink fireball off in the distance.

===

Princess Peach waited as the vortex traveled closer and closer to the balcony she was on. Mario and Luigi were great protectors, but more help never hurt.

When she was able to see you, she sighed in relief... until she saw a pink fireball fly from the Koopa territories.

"No!" Peach cried out when the pink fireball hit your body and snatch you away. As the green vortex deposited nothing in front of her, she muttered, "What have I done?"

==

The pink fireball landed on a large pillow in front of Princess Bowsette before it vanished, revealing your unconscious body. As she looked you over, Princess Bowsette smiled down at you.

"Wonder why Peach-butt pulled you from the otherworld?" Bowsette muttered as she rubbed her chin. "Maybe she wanted you to be another 'hero'? Then I guess I should make you my hero. A beautiful woman like myself should have a hero to call her own."

"After a few moments, Bowsette said," Something about this man says... 'I like women's feet'."

She slipped her feet out of her shoes, revealing her toenails were black claws. She muttered, "I do hope my claws aren't a deterrent. Maybe I should use one of my princess-ified minions?"

===

As you began to stir, Bowsette sighed before she said, "Well, I better see if I can make him mine."

"Eugh... what happened?" You muttered as you slowly sat up.

Using her best imitation of Peach's voice (not hard to do with the super crown mushroom), Bowsette said, "Ah! My knight awakens! I'm ever so glad!"

"Princes Pea-Wait, something's off," You muttered.

"I am Princess Bowsette. I lead a coalition of princesses to fight off that wicked Princess Peach, who is trying to take over Video Game Land by magic and subterfuge!" Bowsette said. "We just look alike because of something called a super crown mushroom that she no doubt created to have body doubles to do her boring work, like open super markets and christen boats."

"...Ever hear of someone called Bowser?" You asked, expecting to be imprisoned.

"Of course. He was my brother and now I have to watch his kids because Peach made him vanish," Bowsette said. "I need you as my hero, as Peach and the mushroom Kingdom are trying to take over the multiverse. They started their invasion in your world by video games and cartoons, trying to make themselves look innocent!"

Looking around, you saw you were in a stone castle's throne room, with a skylight above. There were various statues of Bowsette, trying to look scary.

"...You don't make a good argument, what with that statues of you having fangs and all," You muttered.

"I'm the demon princess of the Koopas! The magic in the position has side effects!" Bowsette yelled, revealing she did have fangs. She then crossed her arms and muttered, "And you probably think I'm disgusting for having claws in my fingers and toes, too."

You looked her up and down, enjoying her sexy figure. You stopped at her feet and said, "I never said that. Only that I have a hard time thinking you're a good guy with a base that says 'bad guy'. But I do have to say that the claws at your toes is very interesting... kinda exotic."

Hiding her smile, Bowsette raised a foot to you and said, "Prove it. I've been on my feet all day and need a massage."

"Alright..." You said, gently grabbing her foot.

As you rubbed your thumbs all over her foot, you made sure to squeeze every so often. You enjoyed her moaning, like it had been the first time she ever got a foot massage.

You did your best to sniff her feet. They did smell like a woman's foot, if with a small scent of peach for some reason.

"Enjoying my feet?" Bowsette asked. You nodded. She then added, "I do hope you plan on accepting my offer, as that blasted Peach is hiding the way to send you back. She no doubt will try to make you think that she is good and I am evil and blah-blah-blah..."

"Well, your sexy feet do make a good argument for me to stay with you," You replied.

"And you'd get access to the others in my princess alliance," Bowsette said, playfully pressing her other foot against your face. "But do you accept becoming my knight?"

You weren't completely sure how it happened, but one day you woke up in the middle of an open field you didn't recognize. As you stood up, your eyes came across a massive castle in the distance. It looked quite similar to Peach's castle from the Super Mario Bros games. Only, rather than a stain glass image of peach on the front, it was instead of her Sarasaland counterpart, Princess Daisy.

No sooner had you arose did you see the castle's owner running at you. She began to fire off question after question about who you were and how you got here. During this "interrogation", you accidentally let slip about her being a video game character in your world. She took it surprisingly well, all things considered.

She took your words into consideration, and seeing that you were now homeless unless you could get home, she was kind enough to set you up with a nice house within walking distance of the castle. She even told her guards that you were always welcome to come and go from the castle as you pleased. You had no idea how to get home, but at least you had a home right now.

*****

It's been a year since you first came here. In that time you've gotten closer and closer to Daisy, forming a tight bond with her that very little, if anything, could break. You were coming by the castle for your daily visit with her. One of the guards told you that she was practicing on the tennis court today. Already knowing the way, you thank him and head around back, where you see her hard at work training.

Instead of her standard dress, she wore a tight, light orange top with a pair of darker orange shorts. On her feet were a pair of white sneakers with orange spots on them. She looked like she was playing hard and working up a sweat. It was actually kind of mesmerizing.

Finally, you snap out of your stupor and call out to Daisy to get her attention. After two or three shouts of her name, you get her out of the zone enough to take notice of you . Turning of the ball machine and setting down her racket, she begins to walk towards you as she speaks to you. "Oh hey, it's my..."

144.content:
You are a wanderer of the stars, always going someplace new. You've worn out your welcome in this city so you decide to make yourself scarce before your bar tabs catch up with you. Heading over to the spaceport you look for somebody willing to give you a free ride, seeing as you have no money. You eventually find a bounty hunter girl who is willing to give you a lift in exchange for some things you overheard easedropping at the bar.

Not really caring where you end up you make yourself as comfortable as possible. Eventually you end up in some place you never would have thought existed, it's like diffrent pieces of land came together to form some sort of organic space station. This place is completely exposed to outer space though, how can you breath here? Thinking things over you decide not to question it, asking questions has never gotten you anything but trouble anyways. Bidding farewell to the bounty hunter girl you pick a direction and start walking hoping you'll find another bar.

As you make your way through the diffrent landscapes you come across what looks like a discarded plush toy but when you lean in closer it suddenly jumps to life and flies off. Being the only living thing you've seen so far you decide to follow this weird, flying, star-shaped creature. When you finally catch up to it you find yourself in some sort of central hub where all these creatures gather. Walking around you see all sorts of star-shaped creatures, and they even come in diffrent colors.

This is crazy, you thought, did I hit my head or something, how can any of this be real?

It seems as though you are stuck here for the time being, might as well make the most of it. Upon further inspection of this area you find a few small buildings and hanging from each of them is a sign written in a language you don't understand. How are you supposed to run up and run out on a tab if there are no bars around here?

You had to clear your head, needed to think some things through, you needed a smoke. Quickly retriving your cigs from your pocket you light one up and take a long drag. That's better, now that your nerves are calmed you can figure a way out of this, or you would if your thoughts weren't interupted by someone clearing thier throat.

Spinning around you see a tall blonde woman glaring down at you. Her hair covered one of her bright blue eyes and she wore a silver crown on her head, she must be in charge around here! She also seems to be floating above the ground, either she can manipulate gravity or you have finally lost it. When you meet her cold gaze again she dosen't speak a word but gestures towards the cigarette in your hand. Great it's going to be one of those days, you reluctantly flick your cigarette towards the ground and quickly extinguish the embers. You don't even know this womans name yet but she appears very interested in you, or at least your pressence here.

How does she feel about you being here?

Readers choice.
1441.content:
As she looks down at you her eyes bwgin to give you the chills. She is beautiful and seems to have all the power around here but something about her body language says you aren't going to be best friends.

"I would welcome you to my home, but it seems you have already made yourself at home." she saus coldly as she gestures towards the crushed cigarette. "People usually consider it an honor to be here, but you just seem to do as you please!"

Well you pissed off the only person who might have been able to get you out of this place so you need to think up a plan fast! The last thing you want is to be stuck in the plush star-creature dimension forever.

"I'm sorry, I only ended up here by accident," you say trying to get on her good side," is there any way I could mayb-". You are cut off before you could finish you sentence when she raises a hand to silence you.

"I don't want to hear any more from you," her tone even angrier than before,"your actions require punishment and I know just how it should be done."

This isn't good, what could she have in mind? You doubt they have any sort of court system around here so she must have something more personal in store for you.

She puts a hand on her chin and seems to be in thought but only for a moment.

"Perhaps I should crush you underfoot just as you crushed your trash in my home!" Her words had you frozen in place, was she serious? You just stood there with a blank face not knowing how to respond.

"Nothing to say in your defence? Very well." Just after her words had sunk in you were forced to the ground by some sort of magic. Her tall form loomed over you and as she moved her dress away you saw that she was wearing a silver pair of heels. "Perhaps it's because Link has the right idea to curry favors by performing tasks for the city he visits, rather than throw around rupees?" Impa asked in response. "We might need to look through our ranks to see who shares his line of thinking?"

Zelda put her head against the table. After a few moment, she said, "I'd live to do that, but that'd eat up too much time right now and a good amount of our current diplomats embedded themselves in too deep... I need a break."

'Perfect," Impa thought. She coughed to get Zelda's attention. Once Zelda gave it, Impa said, "I recently acquired a servant boy. Since he seemed to have a foot fetish, I decided to see how well he fares with foot massages."

With a touch of curiosity, Zelda asked, "How is he?"

"He's unskilled, but has got a lot of talent and a quick learner," Impa answered. "He did try to claim he was Link when I encountered him wandering around, but I doubt anyone other than a fairy could mistake a child for an adult.... Still, he does resemble the hero when he was that young. Shall I bring him here and let him try to relieve your stress?"
151122122221121.title: Impa shares her servant with Zelda.

choices: It was Zelda, who was waking up
It was Malon, who was glad to see Link again
It was a group of people.
1512.content:
(note: this is going to a bit of a crossover with any and all Nintendo games, Kind of like Captain Rainbow, but with a focus on women's feet, rather than getting remembered. Remember, if it was on an Nintendo system, it counts!)

"No, I don't. The spell was far too different than the book described it." Zelda explained as she produced the book and looked through it.

"So what did it do and what was it supposed to do?" Link asked as he tried to stand up, but found his legs were as heavy as lead.

"It was supposed to make a few lanterns give off the scent of the beach, but when I cast it on them, they glowed for a few moments before the lights flew off to hit you. I didn't think it'd knock you out." Zelda answered as she looked the pages. then she noticed that Link was getting sluggish. "Is everything..."

Link passed out before she could finish and the Triforce marks on their hands began to glow a bright, blinding light.

=-=-=

As Link regained his sight, his nose was greeted by the smell of salt and water that only a tropical island could provide. He quickly shot up and looked around. As his sight cleared, he saw that he was on a beach, near a pier and a sign.

The sign read 'Welcome to Tootsy island!"

Link heard someone gasp behind him, so he looked behind himself.
1512.title: A chaotic spell to an island.

Malon doesn't notice and just leads link to the village to meet others.
15122.content:
(Forgive me for any possible mistakes... I haven't played much Legend of Zelda games)

"Link! I am so glad to see you!" Said a familiar voice all of a sudden
Link turned to the source of the voice and noticed Malon, who was running up to him! She was wearing her usual clothes, but there was one significant change, instead of her boots, she now had sandals and tops of her cute bare feet were now entirely visible to him.
"Huh, what's going on? Why am I even on that beach..."Link said confused by the whole situation, last thing he remembered was talking with Zelda and then he lost consciousness
"I don't know I am afraid... seems like me, as well as many other females from Hyrule and some mysterious realms got transported here few weeks ago. I was afraid I wouldn't ever see you again..."She said
"Is Zelda there too?"Link asked, knowing that it must have been her spell that somehow got them transported there, for some reason he found it difficult to take his eyes off Malon's feet... they were still in sandals, but her little toes looked so cute to him all of a sudden
"Princess Zelda? I don't think so... at least not in our village."Said Malon
"In your village? You built one in just few weeks?"Asked Link
"No, the island actually had some abandoned buildings so we turned them into a village of sorts. Come on, let me show you!"Malon enthusiastically said
"Oh... um.. okay! Lead on!"Link suddenly shifts his gaze from Malon's feet back to her face hoping that she didn't notice him staring...
15122.title: It was Malon, who was glad to see Link again

choices: Link stays for now.
Link decides to explore the island.
151222.content:
After Malon turned around and began walking away, she said, "Follow me!"

As Link followed after her, he asked, "So you said your village. Does that mean there's more?"

Malon looked back and nodded before she said, "Yes. There's one that has a bunch of animal women in it, but I think I heard that Ruto was living there. There's a castle that some saw a few magicians in, but it has been closed up since we found it. Perhaps Zelda is there? Another villaige has a number of women who... seem like dark magic users. some claimed to have seen a purple-haired princess Zelda there."

Link sighed. "Let me guess, I'm probably going to fight them?"

Malon shrugged before she looked ahead. "I do not know. I hope not, though."

Link took a moment to look at Malon's feet once more before looking back up....although he did take a moment to study her behind. His smile took a perverted twist for a moment as he debated about which was sexier on Malon before deciding on her feet. When he looked at the back of her head, he asked, "So... whose in the village you're in?"

"Well... There's a large number of them, but I can name a few. There's the Cucco Lady, but I learned her name is Anju. There's the Bomchu lady, a nice girl named Linkle," Malon said. Then with some awe in her voice, she added. "There was also a singer named Nayru, a dancer named Din, a chronicler named Farore... and a human girl who looks like a mix between me and Princess Zelda. Her name is Marin. Like Nayru, she's a singer..."

"Human? Been a while since I've met one of those..." Link muttered. "So the ones named after the Goddesses?"

"As far as I know, Hylian," Malon began. "But..."

"Wouldn't be surprised if they were the goddesses or some kind of avatar..." Link finished.

Malon looked back, giggled, and nodded. "Right, Fairy boy."

After awhile, the two came across the village Malon was staying at. Even though Malon told him Link was surprised to see so many women working around the village.

And apparently, they were surprised to see him, even the ones he knew he never saw before. Link grew a bit nervous when some stared at him like a he was a piece of meat.

When Malon and Link came across the water fountain in the center of town, Malon asked, "Will you stay in the village? I have a spare room in my home."
151222.title: To a village...

choices: Link offers Malon a foot rub
They are interrupted by someone knocking on the door!
1512221.content:
"Well I guess I can stay for a while... there's no saying if I would be as welcome in other villages, and I should learn what you and others already know about this place before trying to investigate what really happened."Link replied
Malon smiled, visibly happy with his answer
"Great! I will show you my place then!"She said, and once again led Link through the village, causing some more looks from the women there
Malon herself didn't seem to notice or care how much attention it all brought however, and instead all the way Link followed, it sounded like she was humming a familiar melody.

Malon's house was on the other end of the village, it was rather average size, similar to those of others, what made it different however was a small pen next to it with three horses inside. Link looked towards them.
"Heh, as you can see my experience from Lon Lon Ranch is useful even here! I'm thinking of building them a bigger pen though, it's bad for them to all be stuck with such little place to run around, and until they are all sufficiently tamed, I am a bit afraid they could get lost somewhere if I let them out... perhaps you could help me?"Malon said and looked at Link
"Well... I guess I should thank you somehow for letting me use your place."Said Link
"That's settled then! How about we do that tomorrow morning?"Asked Malon
"Okay, the faster the better for the horses."Link said
"By the way, by morning I meant around 8:00. I heard you can be almost as much of a sleepyhead as my father sometimes..."Said Malon
"8:00? I can wake up by then... somehow.... possibly..."Link said, realizing that probably tomorrow he won't be well rested in the morning...
"Well if you don't wake up by yourself, I can always borrow a cucco from Ajna and have it wake you up!"Said Malon and smiled playfully
"Maybe there won't be need for that..."Said Link, remembering how he once woke up Malon's father, Talon this way.

Finally Malon led Link inside her house. There were two floors, on the first one there were living room, bathroom and the kitchen. On the second one there were two rooms, one was Malon's, and the other was meant to be Link's from now on. To his surprise the house had all the needed furniture to be somehow comfortable...
"Was all the furniture already there when you found the village?"Asked Link
"Most of it was, some in pretty bad shape, but luckily there happened to be a few carpenters in our group so they fixed them up for everyone, as well as made new whenever it was necessary."
Link nodded, but still it seemed weird... why would people who initially built the village just leave everything like that?

Finally Malon showed Link his room. It was pretty standard, a bed with nightstand next to it, and a small chest for keeping clothes and belongings.
"It is pretty basic... but definitely beats sleeping on the ground!"Said Malon and entered inside as Link followed
She then sat on soon-to-be-Link's bed for a moment
"Hm, sorry for suddenly sitting on your new bed like that, but I am constantly on my feet pretty much since morning, it feels nice to sit down for a moment."Said Malon
Link couldn't stop himself from taking another look at her cute feet... perhaps he could offer her a massage to ease their soreness?
1512221.title: Link agrees to stay at Malon's place.

Putting her feet on his face.
15122211.content:
As Malon raised her hands up in the air and stretched, Link managed to avoid looking at her boobs by looking at her feet.

An idea came to him as he thought about Malon's words.

So the island had people on it before, but not now. Bet there's a few temples with the story... and monsters defending them. Kind of odd that I might be the only guy on this island. Also odd that a lot of the people here are from Hyrule and probably other versions of Hyrule. Man, Malon is hot. I probably can get any job I wanted here, if I flirt. I wonder how I can get closer to Malon's feet? ... I got it!

"Malon, if you want, I can give you a foot rub," Link said.

Malon paused before she looked at Link and said, "Are you sure? The smell might be-"

'It's alright," Link replied as he got on his knees. Malon stared at him for a few moments before shrugging and slipping her feet out of her sandals. Link then scooted towards her until her feet were on his lap.

He began by lightly rotating her feet before moving onto her arches. One he started rubbing her arches, Malon began moaning a little. Link looked up and gave her a smile. All Malon could do was cover her mouth and look away with a blush.

He then moved onto her toes. First, he squeezed each toe, starting from the pinkie toe and going to the big toe. Once he had gotten all the toes on both feet, Link then lightly squeezed and rubbed the spots beneath each toe.

Malon's moans became louder and more frequent, and her breathing got shallower. She thought, 'Either he is an expert or I've been on my feet too long... And just how could he be an expert?'

Link thought, 'The smell isn't so bad. A bit strong, but nice.'

Link let out a confident huff as he moved onto the balls of Malon's feet. He made little circles as he moved down her foot, slowly adding pressure as he did so. He finished each foot by squeezing the little hollow area beneath the ankles.

Looking up, Link saw that Malon was blushing a lot and breathing quickly. With a smirk, he asked, "That wasn't so bad, was it?"

Malon responded by...
15122211.title: Link offers Malon a foot rub

Link decides to look for Farore, or one of the other girls.
151222111.content:
"Yeah... makes me wonder if everyone from your forest are so good at foot rubs."Said Malon, blushing a bit, amazed how good it felt
She slipped her sandals back on, and got up from the bed.
"Anyway, thanks a lot Fairy boy! If you need me, I will be taking care of the horses."Said Malon with a smile, the blush she got after the massage still didn't leave her face
"Alright, feel free to ask me for foot rubs anytime you want!"Link decided to push his luck a bit, hopefully it wouldn't sound strange
"Haha, I certainly will!"Said Malon before leaving the room

Despite the fact that all he did was rub her feet for a moment, Link could feel himself getting rather aroused... if Malon didn't leave when she did, he could have lost control and possibly creep her out by starting to sniff them, or even more. On the other hand... was Malon really the type of girl who wouldn't appreciate someone paying special attention to her feet?
Link decided there was no need to ponder that anymore. He probably should find himself something to do for the day... perhaps talking to other females in the village could help him bring some light to the situation? But whom should he try to seek out?

Maybe that girl called Linkle? Her name sounded really similar to his... and the intuition was telling him that it couldn't be a coincidence. Perhaps she already tried looking for some answers on her own?

Or perhaps he should try asking that girl named Farore, after one of the goddesses in his world. Being a chronicler, she could have been able to already figured out something.
151222111.title: Thanking Link before leaving the room

choices: "Let's go help Anju deliver the Cucco!"
"Let's go to a nearby dungeon. Maybe something might happen on the way there?"
1512221111.content:
As Link left Malon's farm, he thought, 'Might as well see who Linkle is. Hopefully, we have more in common than just our names.'

After wandering around the village, He neared one lady who was loading caged Cucco onto a large cart. He asked, "Excuse me, but do you know where someone named Linkle is?"

The woman smiled in a way that made Link slightly uncomfortable. As she posed in a way that showed off her figure as she said, "Well, when she isn't off adventuring, she's usually helping me with the Cucco. I can tell you where she might be, but I'd like some help loading the Cucco onto this cart. The folks in the castle. I'm Anju, Who might you be, handsome?"

"I'm... uh... Link," Link answered as he picked up a cage and put it on the cart.

"Huh...Wonder if there's any connection?" Anju muttered.

As Link helped Anju put the Cucco onto the cart, she 'accidentally' brushed her body against his a few times.

When the final Cucco was put onto the cart, Anju said, "Thanks. She should be at the village fountain at around this time."

"Thanks!" Link said before he turned and tried to walk away.

Anju held the collar of his shirt. When he looked back, she said, "When you feel like looking for some fun, hot stuff, look me up at the Cucco farm."

"Uh... Okay..." Link said. Anju giggled before she let him go.

True to her word, there was someone sitting at the fountain. She had blonde hair, and was dressed similar to him. She currently was looking at a map.

"Excuse me, but are you Linkle?" Link asked as he neared her.

She looked up and gasped. "You also must be a legendary hero! From a different realm than me!"

Link smiled and nodded. "Yeah, you could say that. I'm Link. So I saw you were looking at a map. Are you an adventurer?"

Linkle nodded. "Yes! I've been looking around the island, since it is my duty. I've been in a few dungeons, but..."

"But?" Link asked as he saw down beside her.

"They've been filled with monsters, but not the kind I've been told about that would be in dungeons. They... They kind of look like either women who are cosplaying as the monsters or entities that are humanoid and female..." Linkle explained, looking a little distressed. Then with a slightly annoyed tine, she said, "I just wish their figures weren't overly exaggerated."

Link held back a smile as he recalled the times Zelda complained about the Gerudo figures. He asked, "So... care for a partner for your next adventure?"

Linkle smiled as she looked at him as she said," I'd be happy for it! but... if you're also a legendary hero... then you also must have... a foot fetish."

she then slipped her feet out of her shoes and began to rub Link's legs with them as she added, "I have one, so you should as well."

Link gulped.

"But first..." Linkle said as she scooted backwards as her feet traveled up Link's legs.

Just before Linkle's feet touched Link's crotch, she took them away and cheerfully said, "Let's go help Anju deliver the Cucco to the magician's castle!"

After Linkle put back on her shoes, she and Link quickly ran after Anju.

Soon, the two heroes were walking alongside a cart. Anju was sitting on the cuccu-ladened cart that was being pulled by a horse.

"Soo... the Castle... I was told that Princess Zelda might be there. Does anyone know which princess Zelda, since there's a number of folks from different dimensions?" Link asked.

"I've tried to get into the castle. I've succeeded once... but I was forced to worship the feet of a number of women who looked a lot alike. I tried to ask why did they keep to themselves, but I..." Linkle answered before her entire head turned red from blushing.

15122211111.title: Tootsy island : Cucco guard duty

One of the strange monster-girls is guarding the dungeon!

Seeing Link's nervous reaction to her feet, Linkle had enough proof that he as well had a foot fetish.

"Let's go to a dungeon together! Oh, but you should also know... having a foot fetish like me, and being a guy on top of that, you might have additional problem fighting against those strange monster girls here."Explained Linkle as she quickly slid her feet back into her boots
"H-huh? Why is that?"Asked Link, still being a bit confused after the teasing, and a bit embarassed about having someone knowing about his foot fetish

Link turned towards the source of the voice and noticed an attractive slightly tan female, with long red hair tied in a ponytail, she also wore sandals   thanks to which link could see her pretty feet, with red painted toenails.

"It happens that we are both legendary heroes... but from different worlds."Said Linkle

"Yeah, nothing beats a nice massage, and feeling of warm tongue on my feet after a performance."Said Din
"Wow..." Said Link as he imagined Linkle lovingly worshipping Din's feet
"Either way, you two seemed to be about to go do some exploring right? See ya later then!"Said the red haired dancer, and left Linkle and Link alone again

15122211112.title: On the way to a dungeon!(After meeting Din)

choices: "No side entrances."
"one, and it is nearby!"
151222111122.content:
(I might be cheating a little bit by using materials from outside of a nintendo game, but I don't care.)

It was a familiar sight.

An over-sized tree that looked like it had a face with the mouth being a door.

"According to a number of villagers, it kind of seems that every legendary hero's first dungeon is a dungeon within a forest. Most of the time, the dungeon door is a tree," Linkle explained as she forced Link to follow her into a bush.

Link would have asked why she was making them hide, but then someone came out of the dungeon.

They apparently were the one that Linkle described. Dog ears and a tail. She didn’t seem as muscular as Link thought, but she seemed liked the type to be very fast. Dangerously fast. She wore armor that barely covered as much skin as underwear did, and carried a spear.

(Other than the clothes, she looks something like this http://safebooru.org//images/14/2185eb92... )

"Moblins..." Link muttered.

"So, that's what they were called..." Linkle muttered.

Then another person came out of the dungeon and began to chat with the first guard. They were muscular, wore skimpy armor, and carried a hammer. As for personal appearance, they had floppy pig ears, an hourglass figure, and a curly pig tail above their big butt.

(She looks just like this http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com... )

"And that?" Linkle asked, pointing at the second guard.

"Also a moblin... They come in either dog species or pig species. Bit odd they don’t look like the ones I’ve met. I don't know much more than that," Link said. "So... Shall we attack or see if we can find a side entrance? Gotta warn you, side entrances tend to lead to room with wallmasters."

"Wallmasters?" Linkle asked, tilting her head a little. Link found that to be quite cute.

Unknown to either one, the Dog Moblin had caught their scent and was taking to the pig moblin if they should capture the heroes or lead them into a trap in the dungeon.

"Giant zombie hands that grab you and put you back at the entrance?" Link asked.

"Never saw one. Did meet a lot of giant purple feet that held me down to the ground a lot. Since they giggled like a girl, I think they're women's feet. So I guess we can call them 'footmasters'?" Linkle said. She paused as she recalled some of the times that the giant foot held her down. A blush came over her. Once or twice, the dog girls, pig girls, and wizzrobes all helped the giant foot play with her.


“So… do the ‘footmasters’ look healthy or zombie-ish?” Link asked.

After shaking herself out of memory lane, Linkle said, “Healthy. According to the wizards in the castle, They’re the feet of someone called ‘The Shadow Queen’.”

Link sighed. He had fought against someone who did seem to have that title,Veran.But her skin was a greenish blue. This meant that there was someone else who commanded shadows.

“Gonna be honest, I don’t think these are moblins. Sure they have some dog and pig features, but they’re too human looking to be a part of those ugly races. Besides, other than being sexually aggressive, They aren’t really evil…” Linkle said. “Well, except for the pig ones. They sometimes get a little too into it.”

“Well, Moblins are the closest race I can think of to describe them. So I’m a bit dim when it comes to books. Sue me,” Link replied, sounding quite annoyed. More than once, a Hylian royal mocked Link’s shortcomings in either etiquette or in book knowledge. Even Zelda was guilty of it at times.

“I guess we could go to that dungeon with a lot of books, but the wizzrobes are everywhere there. Aside from using their magic to hold me down and dominating with their feet, they enchanted my socks and boots to help them dominate me,” Linkle said as she rubbed the back of her head. Another blush appeared on her face.

“So what did the wizzobes look like under their robes?” Link asked, wondering if she knew. For Link, all he was able to see was a hat, a robe, and glowing eyes in darkness.

“I was only able to see their hands and feet.They’re blue,but a bit thin looking. Their robes don’t hide their figure, though….” Linkle answered, a little mad near the end. "I swear, it's like I'm one of smallest..."

“...This island is something else. You get sexually assaulted, instead of beaten up… I guess we can count our blessings...” Link muttered, feeling a little bit excited about possibly dominated be attractive monster girls. “So about that map?”

Linkle looked at the map and said, "The map says that this dungeon has…”

Link tries a risky idea! He starts petting dog girl's head!

Should they agree to dog girl's "deal"? Perhaps during that, the dog girl would let her guard down and they could somehow quietly neutralize her? Or maybe they shouldn't... and instead Link could try some other strategy to surprise the dog girl!

Instead it felt wet and you could feel it sucking on your big toe. Snapping back to reality you realized what was happening. Maylene was sucking on your toe!
15511222121.title: Let Maylene massage your feet.

Politely turn her down.
155112221211.content:
At first you wanted to push Maylene off your feet. She had just offered a massage, sucking on your toes was waaaaay over the line! But just as quickly as you were repulsed by Maylene’s actions, you as quickly started to feel relaxed again. Feeling Maylene’s tongue on your bare skin was an experience even more heavenly then the massage almost even arousing to a degree. You quietly moaned as Maylene continued sucking on your toes. She masterfully swiveled around them as she made to also get right inbetween them as well. After finishing up with all ten of your toes Maylene switched over to licking up and down your soles without a word. As soon as Maylene’s tongue touched your sole you let out loud pleasured gasp as she started to slowly lick up and down the entire sole.. You quite literally collapsed onto the floor as Maylene’s soft tongue continued to tickle and pleasure your feet without pause. This went on for about an Hour as Maylene continued to indulge herself with your feet as you quietly moaned in pleasure as she did. As Maylene finished up, she gave your soles a kiss and then grabbed a towel in the room. With an intense blush on her face, she started to clean your feet of her saliva.

“Mmm. I’m sorry about that. But I had to give your wonderful feet a taste. They were just so soft...”

“It’s...It’s fine. It felt really good...” You tried to recompense yourself the worship session turning you into a blubbering and panting mess. Maylene continued wiping off your feet in silence as you managed to finally calm down.

“Oh by the way, I should give this to you.” Maylene rummaged through her pockets eventually getting out a Cobble Badge and putting in your hands. “You did what I asked of you after all so it’s only right that I keep up my end of the bargain. You smiled as you stared at the shiny new badge in your hand. Not only did you manage to get the badge without a fight, you also got a nice little foot session as well! “But there is one more thing I’d like to ask of you.” Your ears perked up yet again. What did Maylene want now?

“If you wouldn’t mind, would you allow me to join you on your journey?”
155112221211.title: You allow Maylene to continue worshiping

choices: Decide to go Barefoot for the rest of your journey
Refuse Maylene’s suggestion
1551122212111.content:
You pondered on the proposition for a bit and decided, sure why not? Having a strong trainer like Maylene by your side would be a huge help and it was kind of getting lonely traveling with only your trusty Croagunk by your side. Of course, Maylene probably really wanted to join you because of your feet but considering how amazing her massage and worshiping felt you wouldn’t mind getting a few more of those. All in all it just seemed like a really good deal.

“I’d be more than happy if you traveled with me Maylene.” Maylene gave a wide and genuine grin, extremely happy that you seem to be so accepting of her.

“Thank you so much! I’m so glad that I’ll be able to travel alongside you! But since I’m stepping down as Gym Leader I’m going to have to find a replacement to run the gym in my place. Could you wait for me at the Pokémon Center tomorrow morning?”

You nod. The day was still young so you could probably find something to waste time till tomorrow.

“Thank you. I’ll be seeing you tomorrow then okay! I can’t wait to start out journey together!” Maylene bowed down to you in respect and you did the same before putting your shoes back on and leaving the gym. After that, you spent the rest of the day going on a shopping spree at the Veilstone Department Store, getting your Croagunk a nice massage and then going to sleep at the local Pokémon Center.

As soon as the sun started to rise you were already awake as you sat down in the Center’s lobby waiting for Maylene. Soon after, Maylene entered the Pokémon Center and ran over to you, her barefeet slapping against the Center’s tiled floor. Not too surprisingly she was still in the same clothing she wore at the Gym.

“Ah. I’m glad to see you again! Thanks for waiting for me. Luckily, my dad agreed to take over the Gym in my place. At least that’ll stop him from gambling his savings away at the Game Corner for a while. Anyway are you ready to go?”

You give an enthusiastic nod as the two of you head out of the Pokémon Center together. The two of you chat as you eventually make it to your next destination Route 214. It was then that Maylene asked you another question.

“Sorry for asking so many things of you but have you ever thought of traveling around barefoot?” You gave the Fighting-Type Trainer a bewildered look. Of course you never thought of it! Why would that be something you ever thought about? Most people don’t walk around barefoot everywhere. There were of course a few types of trainers like Black Belts, Battle Girls and Psychics walk around barefoot but the rest of the world liked having something on their feet!

But then again, it could be a pretty interesting experience and who knows, Maylene always talked about the health benefits of walking around barefoot so perhaps this barefooting it wouldn’t be so bad.
1551122212111.title: Allow Maylene to join you on your Journey.

After thinking about it for a bit, you decide to try going barefoot for a while. I mean it couldn’t hurt to try right? And if you nothing was stopping you from quickly putting your shoes back on if you started to feel uncomfortable. You slip out of your shoes and socks revealing your own barefeet which instantly causes Maylene to blush. The grass underneath you slightly tickles your soles but it so far it feels pretty nice.

“So how does it feel?”

“It feels pretty good so far. Pretty comfortable.” You wiggle your toes a bit which allowed blades of grass to get in between them.

“Well barefooting on grass is the easy stuff. We’ll have to see how you handle walking through mud or on hot coals!” You shuddered a bit thinking about that but you decided to put those thoughts aside.

“Come on. Let’s get going to Pastoria Maylene.”

“Right! We don’t have anytime to waste!” The two of you continued going through Route 214 as you started to become more and more comfortable with walking barefoot. It really felt comfortable going through the route and feeling the earth pressed underneath your feet.

As you and Maylene continued walking it wasn’t long until you encountered...

So who’s going to fight me first, I’ve been waiting for a long time for another Trainer to show up and I’m not letting you two leave without a Pokémon Battle!” You gulped as you realized that this was a Psychic asking for a battle against a Fighting Type Expert and a Trainer who’s only Pokémon had a severe weakness against the Psychic Type. No matter who fought her they were going to be in for a difficult battle. The Psychic seemingly started to become more and more impatient as she began to tap her foot on the ground.

15511222121111121.content:
As the light finally begins to fade you can clearly see which Pokémon each trainer has sent out. Maylene has brought out her Riolu, the only Pokémon she actually owned herself that wasn’t a part of the Gym’s lineup. Despite the Pokémon small size you could tell how powerful it was just by looking at it as a testament to the rigorous training Maylene has most likely put it through.

Standing opposite of it was a graceful Kirlia and you immediately took note of it’s five-toed human-like green feet with each toe even being adorned by a pure white toenail. You wonder if the Psychic specifically caught the Kirlia because of her strange feet or if was just a simple coincidence. As you tried to not get caught staring at the Emotion Pokémon’s dancing feet the Psychic and Maylene were bantering with each other.

15511222121111121.title: The Psychic sends out her Kirlia!

155112221211111211.content:
The Psychic just laughed.

“We’ll see how confident you still are once your Riolu is under my Kirlia’s feet! Kirlia use Confusion!” Kirlia amplified her psychic powers as her eyes glowed light blue. Soon after and unseen to the naked eye, a telekinetic force pushed Riolu to the ground though the young Pokémon didn’t seem to be too hurt from the attack.

“Finish her off with another Confusion Kirlia!” The Kirlia’s eyes glowed yet again as she prepared to use another attack but Maylene’s Riolu managed to dodge the unseen telekinetic attack.

“Wha!?!”

“We’ll be the ones to finish this trainer! Riolu use Poison Jab!!!” The tips of Riolu’s finger glows purple as it quickly closes the distance between her and Kirlia. Before Kirlia could even react, Riolu jammed it’s finger right into the Kirlia’s gut, causing her to briefly gasp in pain. The Kirlia’s eyes began to flutter rapidly as she fell to her knees and finally crumples to the ground unconscious from the powerful super effective move.

“No! How could this happen!” The Psychic fell onto her hands and knees in shame. “I can’t believe me and Kirlia lost.” Maylene came up to the girl, a disappointed look on her face.

“It was clear as day that you would lose. You were just completely fighting out of desperation. You weren’t focused on the battle at hand but something beyond that...” The Psychic let out a sigh.

“I needed the money real bad. I can’t really beat any of the regular trainers here so I was hoping me and Kirlia could defeat one of the random trainers coming through.” The Psychic looked up to Maylene, as tears started to well up underneath her eyes.

“So that means you don’t have any money to pay me for winning our battle?”

“Y-Yeah. I don’t.”

“I see.” Maylene turned to you with a slightly devious smile on her face. It took you a bit to realize what she was thinking but you soon knew what Maylene was probably planning to do. “Actually, what’s your name Trainer?”

“Abigail.”

“And Hotel Grand Lake is just south of here right?”

“Yes it is. But what are you getting at?”

“Well even though you didn’t win our battle I think I can still give you some money if you do something for me.” The Psychic scurried over to Maylene, quite literally bowing inches away from her feet.

“I’ll do anything, anything!” Maylene’s smile grew much wider.

“Good then. Return your Kirlia into her Pokéball and follow me. The three of us are going to have a lot of fun together.”

————————

About an hour later, the three of you were inside one of the small Bungalows of Hotel Grand Lake. You were still a bit surprised at how no one even seemed to think three barefoot girls walking up to the receptionist to book one of the Bungalows. Perhaps barefoot Trainers were a much more common occurrence then you realized which made you feel a bit relived, especially considering your somewhat blooming foot fetish.

As soon as you entered your room, Maylene quickly locked the door causing Abigail to gulp a bit.

“S-So what do you want me to do for you?”

“Well...”
155112221211111211.title: Riolu easily overpowers and defeats Kirlia!

The newest one(At least at the moment I'm writing it)! We are going to Fodlan then! Continent separated between three nations, Adrestian Empire, Holy Kingdom of Faerghus, and Leicester Alliance. As most of the game happens in Officer Academy, you can be either a random student or a teacher like in the game itself!

How about Edelgard, heir to the Adrestian Empire, beautiful and ambitious leader of the Black Eagles house in the academy? She has certain aura of superiority to herself, but is actually actually treating everyone in academy like equals, despite her noble background.

Or how about Lysithea? A mage from the Golden Deer house, a girl talented in magic, and smart beyond her age. Annoyed by everyone treating her like a kid(Although she really likes sweets and is afraid of ghosts... so she isn't helping herself there).

Ah yes, one of the game's main characters! Always a good pick!

Here's pre-timeskip Edelgard: https://i.ibb.co/BtK48k4/Edelgard-Heroes...
Here's her post-timeskip look: https://i.ibb.co/RgRh0Fz/Edelgard-Artwor...

Perhaps in case of the scenario of you being a professor, you will pretty much just take the place of Byleth, since Edelgard seems to have special interest(Read: crush) on them regardless which house you even choose(Though obviously most apparent on her own route in Black Eagles). However due to machinations of the noble families currently in power in the Empire(Since Edelgard's father is old and sickly, which is used by his Prime minister and other shady people to control everything, ever since an event called Insurrection of the Seven), your family was recently stripped of their lands and power... making Edelgard your only hope to stay at the academy and possibly regain the lands, however to do so you must prove your loyalty...

So... which scenario will it be?
1552111.title: Edelgard

choices: You quickly confirm Edelgard's suspicions and agree to her deal.
