15521111.content:
(You are pretty much in place of Byleth in this story so you might for example see Sothis later on etc.)

It was late afternoon in Garreg Mach monastery, you just finished your daily training routine and were on the way back to your room in the dormitories, until an ominous voice suddenly spoke behind you.
"Lady Edelgard would like to speak with you in her room, professor." The chilling tone of that voice instantly clued you in that it belonged to Hubert, Edelgard's loyal retainer who very rarely was seen too far away from her.
"Huh? That's rare for her to have you just call me like that..." You said, as Edelgard generally had no trouble approaching you herself when she had something to talk about
"Indeed, however it is a fact that she asked me to tell you about this, professor." Hubert explained, as usual making things sound rather shady
You had some suspicions about this, as you remembered Hubert saying once that he would eliminate you, should you ever threaten Edelgard in some way. Not that you were too afraid, years of mercenary work taught you how to deal with surprise attacks, nonetheless it was natural for you to get suspicious about the situation here.

"Do you know what she wants to talk about?" You decided to ask, making sure it wasn't all some shady ploy
"I'm afraid she didn't tell me anything about that, which bothers me to be honest, but as her loyal servant I'm not going to insist for her to tell me everything." Hubert replied
"I guess I will go then." You said, despite the fact his words didn't calm your suspicions at all
"Very good, I trust that you know the way to Lady Edelgard's room? I have to take care of other business at the moment." Hubert said as he went the other way
Well it was certainly a bit calming not to have him go right behind you there...

Either way you made your way to the second floor of the dormitories where most of the students coming from noble families resided. And just as you approached Edelgard's room, you could a voice... presumably hers coming from the inside...
"How should I say that... damn, I should have asked Dorothea, she probably has experience with this kind of thing... maybe I could still go and ask before Hubert finds professor? But then she could start asking too many questions too..." She mumbled to herself
You had to admit, despite not knowing what she was talking about, it was rather cute to see her seemingly nervous like that... she certainly didn't seem like that when in public. However her words also made you a bit more worried just what did she wanted to talk about... it must have been something really unusual if she considered asking Dorothea of all people for advice...

Nonetheless you finally knocked onto the door, which put an end to the mumbling almost instantly, instead you heard Edelgard clear her throat, and then open the door. The heiress to the Adrestian throne looked beautiful as always, and despite seemingly nervous mumbling, nothing seemed out of the ordinary with her at the moment...
"Oh, you came a bit earlier than I thought you would professor. Guess I should have figured that Hubert would prioritize my request over other things he had to do... Either way, please come in, I wanted to discuss a certain matter with you." Edelgard said as she allowed you inside her room, nothing seemed too out of the ordinary inside, aside from a table with two chairs opposite of each other and two steamy cups of tea.

You sat at the table with Edelgard and took a sip of the tea while awaiting what she wanted to talk about.
"Professor... I know that you like feet." Edelgard said out of nowhere, almost making you spit out the tea you were just sipping
"W-where did that come from?" You asked rather awkwardly still taken aback by what she just said
"Perhaps it wasn't the best way to start... what I mean professor is that I saw you getting distracted whenever any female in our class removed their footwear...at first I thought I was just seeing things, but it kept happening both in and out of class. Like the other day when Leonie hurt her foot and Lorenz brought some bandages for her, I saw you looking towards her foot during all of that. Then another day when Flayn was soaking her feet in the pond, I could also notice you sneaking looks while you were fishing, I think even some fish escaped you due to that distraction. Finally during class earlier today, I removed my boots on purpose, and saw you immediately glancing towards my feet...even though I still had my red tights on." Edelgard kept bringing up rather damning examples to you... she seemed to have a little blush when talking there, but it didn't stop her.

You remained quiet, unsure what was Edelgard's plan in confronting you about that... it was true that ever since coming to academy you couldn't help but find yourself attracted to feet of some of the females around... but you were pretty sure that nobody noticed, especially since you didn't act on it or anything!
"Don't worry professor, it's not blackmail or anything like that. What I meant is that your leadership is crucial to our victory in battle, as well as your teaching skills are necessary for our class' growth. We need you fully focused on classes and battles... and there's also matter of what could other professors think if they knew you were attracted to your students' feet... not to mention Seteth if he knew you were peeking at Flayn's. We can't risk having you caught in the act, and therefore I wanted to give you an offer." Edelgard kept talking, her voice not breaking or hesitating, but her face betraying some embarrassment

"I'm going to allow you to do whatever you want to my feet. Just to make sure you keep yourself in control of course... Black Eagles can't afford to lose you." The beautiful future emperor said, her face getting redder by the moment
The idea of pampering or otherwise having fun with Edelgard's elegant feet was certainly a tempting one...
"From your surprised expression I'm guessing I was right... so, professor, do we have a deal?" She said blushing even more noticeably now, and you could hear her taking off her footwear underneath the table, as if to tempt you some more...

15521121.content:
Decided to make you professor in charge of Black Eagles since Edelgard and Lysithea have some things in common, and it could be nice excuse to include both at once at some point in the story. Since Lysithea can move houses, while Edelgard can't.

It was a few months already since you became a professor at the esteemed Officer's Academy in Foldan. Teaching future generations of military commanders certainly wasn't what you expected from your life in your 20s, especially since few of the students here were almost the same age as you. Nonetheless, you somehow found yourself there, as the head professor of the Black Eagles house no less!

Somehow you managed to get yourself a good reputation in those few months as well, making a few students from other houses move to Black Eagles. One of those students was Lysithea, a very talented young mage originally from Golden Deer house, and very rare example of a person with two crests. Only other one you could think of was Edelgard, the leader of your house, coming to think of it both of them also happen to have white hair despite not being related... either way, it sure was good time for you recently.



It was a late afternoon as you happened upon Lysithea in the library, studying some kinds of magic related books as often, you planned to just leave her to her studies, but to your surprise she had approached you on her own a few minutes later.
"Professor, good timing. Could you help me with a spell I've been trying to master recently?" She asked, you knew Lysithea wasn't one to ask for help easily, mostly due to her complex over being treated like a kid.
"Sure, what is it?" You replied without hesitation
"I've been thinking about non-combat spells that could give us advantage during a battle, something that would allow me to read enemies' minds and predict their moves, or perhaps something that would allow me to control them for a short time to cause chaos in enemy ranks. It could be handy to have something like that instead of just relying on simple elemental magic." She explained as often striving to maximize her own usefulness to others
It made sense why she needed help with those, considering you can't really cast spells like that on an inanimate object and expect any effects.

"The books here mostly are about the elemental and healing magic, but I think that thanks to my studies for past few days I might be able to cast one of those I wanted." Lysithea explained as the two of you went towards the dormitories, casting spells like that in Library wouldn't be a good idea, and a student going into professor's room would look rather immoral, so you decided to go to her room instead.

About 15 minutes later, you finally arrived at her room...
"Alright professor, prepare yourself. The spell shouldn't be too dangerous, but since I couldn't test it earlier, I can't tell if there won't be some unforeseen effects." Lysithea explained as she prepared to start casting
You nodded in response and tried to prepare yourself...

What's going to happen?
15521121.title: You are a professor, training magic with Lysithea

choices: Lust... she loves the idea of you worshiping her feet.
Disgust... she thinks you are a pervert.
Reader's Choice
155211211.content:
The spell took hold but you didn't feel any different.

"Did it work?"

Lysithea looked lost in concentration so you waited a moment and then waved your hand in front of her face. She blinked in surprise and looked at you.

"Sorry professor, I was just looking through your mind. You have memories that are strangely shielded from me being able to gain access to. I'll ignore those for now and look at some of the more common ones and..." Her voice cut off suddenly and then she looked up at you in surprise.

"What?"

She fidgeted a bit.

"I... well I get a lot of information all at once with this spell and I didn't mean to pry and certainly didn't mean to look there but well I did and I just have to ask." She took a breath. "You really fantasize about my feet? About the other girl's feet? You play with your... your man parts while thinking about kissing them? Licking them? Really?"

She was incredulous, shocked and surprise. You were utterly mortified. You had no idea what to say or do in a circumstance like this. So you stayed silent as Lysithea processed the information about your strange fetish. What will be her ultimate conclusion and reaction?
155211211.title: A mind reading spell! She will see you thinking...

Lysithea asks you to lie down... and starts rubbing your crotch with her foot!
Dorothea suddenly comes in after overhearing her name mentioned earlier...
1552112111.content:
"That means... I'm actually attractive to boys after all!" Lysithea said with a sudden smile appearing on her blushing face
"Huh?" You were rather surprised at your white haired student's conclusion there, you fully expected her to be disgusted... or at least extremely embarrassed, and never wanting to speak of it again, instead she seemed almost... delighted?

"I don't have interest in romance of course, I don't have time for such things, and it would be wrong to do so with a teacher... but knowing that you consider a part of me attractive like this, means that you view me as mature, professor!" Lysithea said, which made you realize what was her point... it was part of her complex about her being viewed as childish.
"I suppose so... I mean you work harder and are more responsible than some of the older age-wise students." You said uneasily, with your secret fetish outed like that you didn't want to risk saying something dumb and having Lysithea tell everyone in the academy

"Thank you professor, for your help and... reassuring me like that. Although... I honestly never thought someone could like feet like that, I mean... don't they get sweaty, or smell bad after I walk all day?" Lysithea's earlier delight now turned into slightly embarrassed curiousity
"W-well... when someone has foot fetish, sweat and smell of cute feet might not actually seem bad at all..." You said rather uneasily, wondering how did things end up this way for you...
"Huh... maybe I should read some books about those subjects. Though I suspect Seteth wouldn't allow them into our library here... professor, do you think you could... demonstrate it to me?" Lysithea said, her blush suddenly getting redder, as she seemed genuinely curious about your fetish now!

"D-demonstrate how?! B-besides, isn't it wrong to do that?!" You asked, rather taken aback by the proposition, not that you were in position to refuse whether Lysithea realized it or not...

Reader's Choice
15521311112.content:
You were Corrin, Princess of Nohr and on your first mission without your siblings. It had ended in tragedy with the death of your bodyguard, your head was still spinning upon learning about the astral plane. You had just stepped out of the gate when from out of no where someone attacked you and knocked you out. You didn't even get a chance to see who it was.



You eventually came to and found yourself tightly bond wearing nothing but your under garments. You look around wildly and then see the prisoner that your brother Leo had saved and teleported away. You recall her name was Rinkah and she was of the Flame Tribe.

https://www.deviantart.com/mikkusushi/ar... (ART)

"Have a nice nap Nohrian scum?"

You were caught by the enemy. You weren't sure what to do, it wasn't as if you had any valuable intelligence. You supposed you were going to be executed. The thought scared you but you had prepared to fall in battle before you set out. If this was your fate, so be it.

"Why bother with the rope? Aren't you going to execute you anyway?"

Rinkah stalked toward you. "Execute you? Hmm maybe eventually but first I am going to have some fun with you."

You grew pale, was she talking about torture? You felt your body shiver involuntarily. Your captor loomed oppressively over you. She was very muscular for a woman but still had feminine grace and curves. She looked like she could break you like a twig.

Swallowing thickly you wonder what she had in mind.
15521311112.title: Female Corrin

choices: She continues to trample your body.
She gives you a reprieve... only if you clean her feet with your tongue!
Reader's Choice
155213111122.content:
You watch in great trepidation as she lifts her foot high above you and then slams it down on your belly. Her foot was bare but that didn't stop the stomp from being horribly painful. The force she mustered with her powerful muscular legs was insane. Your hands were roped to your sides and your ankles were tied, whens he struck down you doubled over in agony, your body contorting in pain.

"Weak pampered girl, you are already mewling from one blow?"

Rinkah snarled at you and lifted you up by your hair until you were eye level with her. She spat in your face and threw you back down on the ground. Her foot pressed down onto your spit covered face and she pushed her weight onto it while grinding her saliva all over you. You could barely breathe as your nose was being crushed by her large bare feet.

When she lifted her foot off of you, you took in a breath only for her to slam her foot back down onto your chest driving all the air out of your lungs.

"Pathetic! Gasping like a fish out of water. Had you been raised by the Fire Tribe we would never have tolerated such weakness."

You tried to roll over onto your belly so she would stop attacking your face but as you rolled over she lashed out with a vicious kick which stopped your roll midway through and launched you five feet backwards. Your rib was one fire, you suspected it might have been cracked by the blow.

"Please... no more." You begged. It had only been a few blows but you were already suffering greatly. She was as strong as Xander! You wouldn't last much longer if she kept up this abuse.

She didn't respond only advanced and stomped down on your battered ribs. The pain made you see double for a moment as you cried out. Grinning with glee Rinkah jumped into the air and you saw her land in horrifyingly slow motion. Both of her feet land on your torso, one foot on your belly and the other on your breasts.

Once again the air was smashed out of your lungs but unlike her stomp which was force and then it stopped and allowed you to breathe, this time her weight was on your body. You were able to breathe, barely, but it was a struggle and you felt yourself turning red under the feet of Rinkah.
155213111122.title: Rinkah is going to kick, trample and stomp all ...

choices: You... like it?  And Rinkah notices it!
It is disgusting, you feel sick to your stomach but obey out of fear.
While she is distracted you undo the ropes... can you turn the tables?
1552131111222.content:
"Please... can't.. get... air." You gasp out in pathetic fright. Rinkah did not look as if she was incredibly heavy but her body was almost made purely out of muscle which was more dense. With all of her weight fully on your breast and stomach your lungs were being compressed.

"Begging for mercy already? Nohr must breed absolute weaklings." She shifted her weight, balancing the majority of it on the foot crushing your breast down. She fully stood with just that foot and pushed her other one into your face.

"If you want mercy, earn it. Lick my foot clean of all the filthy sweat that has accumulated on it! Lick it!"

You wanted to balk at doing this retched task but if you angered her she would no doubt go back to kicking and stomping you. You didn't have much hope of rescue but you couldn't just lay down and die. You had to appease the tribal bitch for now and hope something would change. With that decided you opened your mouth and pressed your tongue to her soles.
1552131111222.title: She gives you a reprieve... only if you clean h...

choices: Rinkah likes your tongue on her feet so she will allow you to continue.
Rinkah is absolutely disgusted and goes back to stomping and kicking you.
Rinkah leaves to make her feet filthy and then returns, so you don't enjoy it!
15521311112221.content:
You opened your lips and let your tongue out, the very first taste was salty and bitter from the sweat on her feet. But somehow despite the taste, something felt right about it. As your tongue swept across her sole you felt yourself growing warm.

Rinkah got off of your body and pulled up a chair allowing her to get comfortable as you obediently licked her feet. You were able to breathe comfortably now and yet you still felt flushed. The taste of her soles, it was still salty but it also tasted good. Addicting even. You moaned with pleasure, not disgust as you continued to worship her feet.

Rinkah wore a confused expression on her face.

"What kind of sick twisted pervert are you? Do you actually like doing this with my feet?" She asked absolutely incredulous at the idea.

"I've never done anything like this before. I... I don't really understand it but the taste is so good. And I've always loved women more than men in bed and..."

Rinkah shook her head in disgust and muttered something about Nohrian deviancy. You felt shame and wonder just what the Flame Tribe barbarian would do with this news. She seemed to have enjoyed your oral ministrations on her feet, would she want more even if you actually liked it?
